page.title: 08HOUSING: BRIDGE OF EARN
page.content: { There are two groups of housing in B.ofE.First the houses built in the local red sandstone during the 18th and 19th century.These include single storey cottages in rows;three storey terrace houses and villas with gardens,and larger detached houses with big gardens. Recent housing,mostly built within the last twenty years,in the form of estates-both council and private. Building is still going on. There are 500 people in the new housing in Kintillo.It is felt that the community spirit is being ruined by commuting incomers.
